name: Mitos (Zanji Dev)
description:
Mitos is a short horror RPG game made with RPG Maker MV. This game generally has 2 sessions, namely gathering information and solving puzzles. As with most similar games, this game has more than one that can be obtained.

Synopsis

Yusna, who doesn't believe in supernatural things, forces Akbar to join his expedition in search of new species. Even though he insisted that the place he visited was a haunted place, Yusna didn't care.

Controls

With touch screen support, you can also play this game using Android. RPG Maker MV also supports gamepads and keyboards by default.

For keyboard users:

  • Arrow keys: move
  • Z: selecting options, interacting with objects
  • X: deselect, open menu
